participant_1.background:
My dolls help me cope with the stress of my job.
my wife is a college professor.
i am currently looking for a job in baltimore.
I am still trying to lose weight.
I love Halloween, as I enjoy dressing up and getting into the spooky spirit.

participant_2.background:
I'd brag to my friends about my massive collection of foreign films.
my favorite book is the tale of genii.
I collect momentos from my favorite concerts.
I'd love to go to a game with my brother and then cook the game we caught.
i am obsessed with my dog.

content.text: Hey there! How is your day going?
So far, so good! What about yours?
It's going alright. I'm just a little stressed out about my job search.
What type of job are you looking for?
I'm looking for a job in the Baltimore area. I'm hoping to find something in marketing or public relations.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'll find something great.
Thanks! I hope so.
I'm obsessed with my dog. What kind of animals do you have?
I have a cat named Mr. Snuggles. He's a big ball of fur and love.
That sounds adorable! I love cats.
Yeah, he's a great little guy.
Do you like to go to concerts?
I love going to concerts! I've been to a lot of different ones over the years.
That's awesome! I collect momentos from my favorite concerts. I have a whole box full of them.
That's such a cool idea! I love collecting things.
Me too! I have a massive collection of foreign films. I love watching them and learning about different cultures.
That sounds really interesting! I've never really been into foreign films, but I might have to give them a try.
You should! There are so many great ones out there.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem!
